trustfund:
TF025430-PHRD-ECONOMIC ADJUSTMENT CREDIT,TF025380-PHRD-TA FOR PRIVATE SECTOR
            ENERGY DEV.,TF021347-PRIVATE SECTOR DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the project were
            partially achieved, and the outcome of the project is
            unsatisfactory. The key lessons are: a) In the absence of a
            stable macroeconomic environment, financial sector
            operations are not likely to succeed. b) Broader
            achievements under financial intermediary loans are unlikely
            within an undisciplined credit environment; in this case,
            measures should be included to address issues relating to
            governance, management, financial policies, collection
            performance, appraisal and supervision techniques, and
            credit risk management policies of participating financial
            institutions. c) When erroneous decisions are made and these
            mistakes are realized, countermeasures, including project
            cancellation, should be taken as soon as possible to
            minimize their cost.
